usage.cn: 去睡觉，把今天的各种悲伤难过都睡走！
usage.eng: Sleep away the sadness of today.

usage.cn: 没有了爱，地球便成了坟墓。
usage.eng: Take away love, and our earth is a tomb.

usage.cn: 把握身边的幸福吧，不要让它擦肩而过。
usage.eng: Grasp the happiness around it, don't let it slip away.

usage.cn: 有时候，惟有一场眼泪，我们才彻底清晰了视线。
usage.eng: Sometimes our vision clears only after our eyes are washed away with tears.
